results.title: Postmortem fatal and non-fatal concentrations of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is a @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@dihydropyridine@@@ calcium channel blocker widely used in the treatment of high blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@.

results.title: Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial.
results.text_hl: We compared the use of @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on the primary outcome of combined @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, or all-cause mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with isolated @DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ or isolated @DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@diastolic hypertension@@@.

results.title: The effects of antihypertensive class on gout in older adults: secondary analysis of the Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The Antihypertensive and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@-Lowering Treatment to Prevent @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Heart Attack@@@ Trial (ALLHAT) was a randomized clinical trial on the effects of first-step @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on fatal @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ or nonfatal @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ (1994-2002).

citations.NLM: Juraschek SP, Simpson LM, Davis BR, Shmerling RH, Beach JL, Ishak A, Mukamal KJ. The effects of antihypertensive class on gout in older adults: secondary analysis of the Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial. J Hypertens. 2020 May;38(5):954-960. PMID: 31977576

results.title: Overview of the prospective randomized evaluation of the vascular effects of Norvasc (amlodipine) trial: PREVENT.
results.text_hl: The antiatherosclerotic effects were discordant in that minor @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary lesions@@@ were not affected, whereas carotid intima-media thickness showed significantly less progression in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Coronary heart disease benefits from blood pressure and lipid-lowering.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: We have reported the benefits of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and of an @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-based regimen on @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@) events in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the Anglo-Scandinavian Cardiac Outcomes Trial (ASCOT).

citations.NLM: Sever PS, Poulter NR, Mastorantonakis S, Chang CL, Dahlof B, Wedel H, ASCOT Investigators. Coronary heart disease benefits from blood pressure and lipid-lowering. Int J Cardiol. 2009 Jun 26;135(2):218-22. PMID: 19232755
